entry.title: Chrome OS: Yo dawg, I heard you like desktops so we put a workspace in your workspace
entry.summary:
So you can work on something while you work on something

Google has added virtual desktops to its Chrome OS, used in Chromebooks, enabling users to create multiple workspaces and switch between them.â€¦

entry.title: What is this? 1989? Laplink is still a thing and wants to help with Windows 7 migrations
entry.summary:
Software survivor celebrates middle age with facelift

File transfer veteran Laplink has taken advantage of the impending demise of Windows 7 to remind those faced with a migration challenge that it still exists.â€¦

entry.title: NPM today stands for Now Pay Me: JavaScript packaging biz debuts conduit for funding open-source coders
entry.summary:
Like a particular module? You're one command away from being able to donate some dosh for it

NPM Inc, maintainer of the widely used JavaScript package manager npm, has taken a step toward fulfilling a promise made in August to help open-source developers seek compensation for their labor.â€¦
